About us

Who We Are

Development and Relief without Borders (DRB) is a Lebanese charity providing support to the humanitarian needs of both Lebanese and Palestinians Refugees in Lebanon. The lack of a political solution to the crises puts DRB in a position to provide services in compliments with human right to survive. DRB delivers humanitarian aid to those worst affected by conflict and displacement and at the same time works for the dignity of Palestinians living as refugees.

Our History

DRB started its work in 2006 after the Israel war on Lebanon and got registered in 2008 after the conflict of Nahr El-Bared Palestinian refugees camp in north of Lebanon.

Dental awareness

Volunteer doctors who are from the committee of DRB implemented awarenes and checked the teeth of Palestinian Students at the schools of UNRWA at Beirut.

Tooth checkup for all kids up to 12 years old.

Our Achievements

DRB through its implemented projects could influence the international NGOs with the outcome reflected on beneficiaries which gave more support internally and sure to international charities to support.
